metadata.synopsis: This AD plays when Chop, the Colony Butcher, dies. Chop will fight you because he is enthralled, but has a secret desire to be put out of his misery.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Use ReCon command "oe COL_Butcher" or use the debugbook to go to the Colony Morgue- Kill Chop, the butcher

0.speaker: Chop
0.text: Death. Free at last. No more chop, chop, chop...
0.context: NodeContext: Relieved, dying breath, Flicker of lucidity as he's finally freed from mental enslavement.
